events.desc: The `sb-product-model-loaded` event is fired whenever `fireLoaded` is called.

jsdoc.description: The `sb-product-model-loaded` event is fired whenever `fireLoaded` is called.
jsdoc.orig:
*
       * The `sb-product-model-loaded` event is fired whenever `fireLoaded` is called.
       *
       * @event sb-product-model-loaded
       * @detail {{product: Object}}

events.name: sb-product-model-loaded

properties.name: auto
properties.desc:
`auto` indicates whether the product model should load automatically.
If false, the user is responsible for calling the 'load' function.
TODO: Move auto to Behaviour so we can share between many model elements

properties.name: fireLoaded
properties.desc:
Notify product is loaded

Yeehaw!

properties.name: load
properties.desc: Manually load the product model

properties.name: loadFromContext
properties.desc:
`loadFromContext` indicates whether the element should first check for a local window context
object containing the product. If not found, call the API.
TODO: Move auto to Behaviour so we can share between many model elements

properties.name: product
properties.desc: Product Model

properties.name: _contextObjectAvailable
properties.desc: Check if we have a valid context object to use

properties.name: _loadProduct
properties.desc: Populates the this.product property and fires `sb-product-model-loaded`

properties.name: _productLoadedFromAPI
properties.desc: Last response from the api when the product has been loaded..

properties.name: listeners
properties.desc: Event Listeners

properties.name: ready
properties.desc: Element Lifecycle
